title: Type in the sky
content:
This terrific collection of pictures was mentioned on boingboing.net today, and I thought I should point it out. Hope you all enjoy it.

AHL

author: ahleman

comments.content: I didn’t get it at first. Very cool idea!!! That couldn’t have been easy.
